[data-event-id='1'].title: Fully assigned
[data-event-id='1'].content: No more jobs can be dragged to this session

[data-event-id='5'].title: Partially assigned
[data-event-id='5'].content: Can fit an additional two 1 day jobs or a single 2-day job

[data-event-id='4'].title: Unassigned
[data-event-id='4'].content: Can fit 3 jobs that are no longer than 1 day

[data-id='22'].title: Unscheduled jobs
[data-id='22'].content: Drag them to a session to assign and schedule. Note: This demo uses the Bryntum Grid component which is licensed separately.
